description: A React functional component named EnvCard that provides a user interface to view and set a tenant ID, and display connector statuses with actions. The component manages local state and interacts with external utility functions getTenantId and setTenantId.

methods.name: EnvCard
methods.description: React functional component rendering a dashboard environment card with tenant ID input, refresh button, and connector statuses.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles saving the tenant ID locally after trimming whitespace, with user alerts.
